name: catch the potatoes
description:
This is a project, I worked on for my lessons on JavaScript.

Click on the fulllscreen button, so you will have the full game window.

I have done the graphics of the first page beside the truck. Images on the game page and the pop-up window have been taken from the Internet.

Pop-up window shows a French written text.

There is a truck , that goes further if you don't try to use the arrow keys "left and right" , to catch the potatoes . If you click on the potatoes they fall down and you need to catch them with the truck otherwise they explode.

I will improve the game and put more options.

Don't hesitate to leave some comments. It will help to improve my game.

Thanks
